attributes.action: Change The London 2012 Olympic Jagged Emblem Logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The jagged emblem, based on the date 2012, proposed for the 2012 Olympic logo is a complete embarrassment to the nation and should not be used. 
The unsightly logo is horrid on a monumental scale.
The London Olympic Committee should be called into account and reminded who they represent. The negative response from the public speaks for itself.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
